testcase.name: amazonAllyTest

failure.message: Found 7 accessibility violations: 1) ARIA attributes must conform to valid names: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.2/aria-valid-attr?application=axeAPI a) [".navFooterDescLine"] Fix any of the following: Invalid ARIA attribute name: aria-lable 2) Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.2/image-redundant-alt?application=axeAPI a) ["img[alt=\"Sweatshirts\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text b) ["img[alt=\"Joggers\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text c) ["img[alt=\"Cardigans\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text d) ["img[alt=\"Easy\\ tees\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text 3) Form elements should have a visible label: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.2/label-title-only?application=axeAPI a) ["#searchDropdownBox"] Fix all of the following: Only title used to generate label for form element 4) Ensures landmarks are unique: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.2/landmark-unique?application=axeAPI a) ["#navbar"] Fix any of the following: The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable 5) Links must have discernible text: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.2/link-name?application=axeAPI a) ["a[href=\"\\/\\?ref_\\=footer_logo\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text Fix any of the following: Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty Element has no title attribute 6) Page should contain a level-one heading: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.2/page-has-heading-one?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix all of the following: Page must have a level-one heading 7) All page content should be contained by landmarks: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.2/region?application=axeAPI a) ["#skiplink"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks b) ["#navBackToTop"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks c) [".navFooterVerticalColumn"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks d) ["#icp-touch-link-language > .icp-color-base"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks e) ["#icp-touch-link-cop"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks f) ["#icp-touch-link-country > .icp-color-base"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks g) [".navFooterCopyright"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks expected [true] but found [false]
